Text: I love the irony of the people that worship her and the current crop of conservatives like Paul Ryan and similar that preach her writings yet know almost nothing about her and the reality of how she lived her life. Bisexual, addict, and many other things that hopefully this book delves into...not to mention the best of all, the fact that she lived off the government at the end of her life. lol
